text: 195px was a Japanese sprinter. She competed at the 1964 Olympics in the 80 m hurdles and 4 × 100 m relay events and finished fifth in the hurdles, setting her personal best at 10.7 seconds. Yoda retired shortly after the 1964 Olympics. She died by committing suicide at the age of 45. She previously attempted suicide in 1960, after failing to qualify for the 1960 Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Japanese female sprinters Category:Japanese female hurdlers Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1958 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Japan Championships in Athletics winners Category:Suicides in Tokyo
title: Ikuko Yoda
